game.name: DCS: NS 430 Navigation System for C-101EB
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: The NS 430 for the C-101EB module integrates the NS 430 panel directly into the C-101EB cockpit (not as a pop-up display).
game.shortDescriptionEn: The NS 430 for the C-101EB module integrates the NS 430 panel directly into the C-101EB cockpit (not as a pop-up display).
